Undeath To Death (C6 Necr): R270' Destroys 17d4 HD of undead w/up to 8 HD in 40' radius (DC 16 Will neg)
Undetectable Alignment (C2 Abju): R65' Conceals target alignment for 1 dy (DC 12 Will neg)
Unhallow (C5 Evoc): 40' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves vs. good, suppresses mental control, bars contact by summoned good creatures, imposes -4 turn undead penalty, gives +4 rebuke undead bonus, and evokes bane spell
Unholy Aura (C8 Abju): 17 creatures in 20' radius gain +4 AC and saves and SR 25 (good), suppress mental control, and inflict -1d6 Strength on successful good attacker (DC 18 Fort neg) for 17 rd
Virtue (C0 Tran): Touched gains +1 temporary HP for 1 min
Wall Of Stone (C5 Conj): R270' Creates 17 5' x 4 inch thick permanent stone wall
Water Breathing (C3 Tran): Touched can breathe underwater for 34 hrs total
Water Walk (C3 Tran): 17 touched can walk on liquid as if it were a solid surface for 170 min
Wind Walk (C6 Tran): Self and 5 touched vaporize and move 60 MPH for 17 hr
Wind Wall (C3 Evoc): R270' 170'x5' curtain of air scatters objects, deflects arrows and bolts for 17 rd
Word Of Chaos (C7 Evoc): Nonchaotic creatures in 40' radius with equal/-1/-5/-10 HD deafened for 1d4 rd/stunned for 1 rd/confused for 1d10 min/killed (DC 17 Will neg)
Word Of Recall (C6 Conj): Self and 5 willing targets return to designated place
Zone Of Truth (C2 Ench): R65' Creatures in 20' radius cannot lie for 17 min (DC 13 Will neg)
Magic Notes:
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Craft Staff: Create magic staff
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: Cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Still Spell: Cast spell w/out movement uses +1 spell slot
Widen Spell: x2 area of affect uses +3 spell slot
